title: every game a feeder every game riot does nothing about it
body: ah the happy place where i get to mark people for feeding and people tell me its ok because they are playing poorly and shouldn't be punished. bull, if i have to be punished for their deaths they should be banned or place with people that play as badly as they do. cant even stand climbing ranked anymore due to this idiocy. i am glad i made the choice never to spend money ever again on riot or their products, and i invite everyone to do the same. aram is now getting just as bad.  so many 10+ deaths on multiple players. make the nightmare stop. stop funding riot until they can stop this type of behavior.

replies.body: No one should get banned for playing poorly, player should only be reported for toxicity or feeding intentionally. So, yea this post is a waste of time.
You talking trash with ur little brain. Even if he intent to feed, he wont get banned because Rito games isnt interested in a fair game.

Why are you complaining about one sided ARAM games? It's rare to see 2 teams evenly matched in that game mode, since comps cannot be planned. That said, what do you honestly expect?
In fact, I saw your match history. Every single game was ARAM. Even if every last feeder did it on purpose, it wouldn't hurt your elo at all.

I suspect if you took more time to focus on your own gameplay instead of that of others, you would climb quite a bit faster.

For players who are truly well below their correct MMR, it is possible to climb an entire tier (ex: bronze 5 to silver 5) in well under a month. If you're "hardstuck" at a certain MMR, it's because that's your skill level. The only way to climb is to improve your skill level.

cute been to gold. simply put if i cared to grind out 2000 games in a year i could do it again even with the feeders. the point is no one should have to play that many game bc of people who shouldn't be in ranked. i quit playing ranked because of that bull and started playing aram where the players don't feed to all hell. now they feed just as badly there. i would gladly wait in que for an hour to play a match with teammates that were actually on the same level. which is what they should be playing with, a bunch of feeders just like them.

The key phrase here is the idea that players should be playing with people as bad as they are. I'm bad, most of us are bad depending on the comparison. For games to be fun they must be well matched.

He is saying they are not. He is right.

Usually players mention things like, mmr this or that- something about impacting your climb and who you are matched with...

Should I not be matched with silver 3 players if I am in silver 3... regardless of my mmr? Why would I EVER play anything higher, unless I was actually in that division...? I realize that is how it actually works- and this is why the poster is right. Matchmaking is downs.
